Package org.apache.iceberg

Interface CombinedScanTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ScanTask, ScanTaskGroup<FileScanTask>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCombinedScanTask
    public interface CombinedScanTask
extends ScanTaskGroup<FileScanTask>
    A scan task made of several ranges from files.
